alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Fayette; Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 9:37PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bastrop, south central Lee and Fayette Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 937 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Paige to near Round Top. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Giddings, La Grange, Smithville, Schulenburg, Fayetteville, Round Top, Paige, Muldoon, Cistern, Circle D-KC Estates, Swiss Alp, Dubina, Northrup, Rutersville, Warrenton, Ledbetter, Waldeck, Plum, Buescher State Park and Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Texas.
